title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Special Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Special Events                Special Events       Many requests are received to use Mount Rushmore National Memorial for various reasons. When such requests are inappropriate, they are denied. Frequently, because of lack of space, funds, staff resources, etc., even appropriate uses have to be denied; however, compatible, non-commercial (does not involve the buying and selling of goods or services) use of the Mount Rushmore amphitheater is permitted from time to time with a Special Use Permit. For more information, download the Guidelines for Special Use Permit Applications (366 KB PDF). Application forms are below: Application for Special Use Permit (Short Form) - 492 KB PDF Application for Special Use Permit (Long Form) - 631 KB PDF
